mapper.select: SELECT store_id, store_name, address, store_img, category, approve, price, product_cnt FROM tbl_store WHERE store_id = #{store_id}

SELECT c.customer_id, c.nickname, c.customer_phone_number, p.product_id, r.reservation_id, r.reservation_time, r.cancel_reservation_at, r.picked_up_at, p.pickup_time, p.product_upload_date, s.price FROM tbl_reservation r JOIN tbl_customer c ON r.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN tbl_product p ON p.product_id = r.product_id JOIN tbl_store s ON s.store_id = p.store_id WHERE s.store_id = #{store_id}
